attributes.action: publically emphasise the fact that all people - born in this country or another - are human beings, that immigration brings enourmous beneft to our society and we have a moral duty to welcome Asylum seekers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are not tagged at birth as a tool of a state. Blood has no nationality. We value life for what it is, and believe that we should support our fellow human beings wherever they were born.

rejection.details: You need to make a clearer call-to-action here
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
